items.content_html: Meta Tag Generator is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to automatically generate meta tags and Open Graph tags for any HTML page. This tool simplifies the process of adding essential metadata to your web pages, enhancing SEO and social media sharing capabilities.
items.title: anupammo/generateMetaTags: Meta Tag Generator is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to automatically generate meta tags and Open Graph tags for any HTML page. This tool simplifies the process of adding essential metadata to your web pages, enhancing SEO and social media sharing capabilities.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: Notably is a lightweight, personalized note-taking web-app designed for efficient task and life management. It serves as a to-do list while offering widgets that provide key updates on inevitable aspects of daily life. With a focus on simplicity and usability, it helps users stay organized and informed in a seamless, intuitive way.

It serves as a to-do list while offering widgets that provide key updates on inevitable aspects of daily life. With a focus on simplicity and usability, it helps users stay organized and informed in a seamless, intuitive way.

items.content_html: A simple and intuitive color picker application built with React and CSS. This app allows users to select colors visually and provides corresponding color codes for easy usage in design and development projects. It's lightweight, responsive, and showcases the power of React's state management and dynamic rendering.
items.title: ibryamibryamov7/react-color-picker-app: A simple and intuitive color picker application built with React and CSS. This app allows users to select colors visually and provides corresponding color codes for easy usage in design and development projects. It's lightweight, responsive, and showcases the power of React's state management and dynamic rendering.

items.content_html: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management web application built with Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and SQLite. This app allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, with an intuitive interface that supports dark and light themes. It features optimistic UI updates, real-time notifications, and automatic task deletion after

items.content_html: CloseDuplicateTabs is a lightweight Firefox extension that removes duplicate tabs, keeping only the most recent one for each URL. It offers optional statistics on the cleanup process, including the number of tabs before and after cleanup, and how many duplicates were removed.
items.title: az-xx/CloseDuplicateTabs:  CloseDuplicateTabs is a lightweight Firefox extension that removes duplicate tabs, keeping only the most recent one for each URL. It offers optional statistics on the cleanup process, including the number of tabs before and after cleanup, and how many duplicates were removed.

items.content_html: Simple WhatsApp bot I made to make using WhatsApp faster and easier. It fully depends on the XSTRO API where all the functionality is processed. I used Axios to keep it lightweight and fast. All you need is a decent internet connection from your server.
items.title: AstroX11/Xstro: Simple WhatsApp bot I made to make using WhatsApp faster and easier. It fully depends on the XSTRO API where all the functionality is processed. I used Axios to keep it lightweight and fast. All you need is a decent internet connection from your server.
